description: An all-in-one breakfast treat, which is easier to make and serve than cooking a fry-up for all the family.
name: British Breakfast Frittata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 190°C (Gas 5). Heat the oil in a heavy-based frying pan and fry the bacon gently for 3 minutes until it starts to brown. Add the mushrooms and cook over a high heat for a further 5 minutes until browned all over. Add the potatoes and cook for a final 2 minutes.
Whisk together the eggs and cream in a large bowl and season well. Add the cooked mushroom mixture and the cherry tomatoes and mix well.

Grease a 20cm non-stick cake tin with the butter and pour in the egg mixture. Make sure all the bits are distributed evenly and the egg just covers the filling. Sprinkle with the cheese and bake for 20-25 minutes, until just set, golden brown on top, and puffed up at the sides.
Remove from the oven and rest for at least 5 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve warm or at room temperature.
